author: I Made Sentana
title: Indonesia to Help Smaller Firms Stay Afloat
text:
JAKARTAâ€”Indonesia will provide loans at lower interest rates to labor-intensive small and medium-size companies, to help them maintain operations and avoid layoffs, a minister said Monday.
Finance Minister Bambang Brodjonegoro said that the loans will be...
